question: I'm unable to login as a workgroup member and wanted to make sure that I receive credit for the training.
text:
I'm unable to login as a workgroup member and wanted to make sure that I receive credit for the training.
          
        
Pennie appreciates all of our Broker Workgroup members and their participation in making Pennie the best platform for our customers; however, we do not require participation, nor do we award CE credit for your participation.
